[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” class=”mb-0″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” bottom_margin=”0″ width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

  • We get scrap and raw materials moving again. Sustainably.


    Scrap metal should be out creating value instead of just sitting there. With 130 years in the recycling business, we know a thing or two about where and how to get it and where and how to ship it.


    Read More
                     

  • Scrap today, value tomorrow.


    Recycling is here to stay. Not only does it play a vital role for the future of our planet by reducing energy consumption and air pollution. It also directly affects your bottom line positively. We are always looking for best-in-class recycled metals for our best-in-class customers. Stuck with more than a few tonnes? We’ll get it moving, so the value goes straight into your pocket.


    Read More
                     

  • Let us break it down for you


    We offer a wide range of comprehensive dismantling and recycling solutions according to international standards – at highly competitive prices, of course, so you can maximise your profit on the demolition job.


    Read More
                     

  • What can we do for you?


    Explore our best-in-class products and services and discover the many ways we can create value for your business.


    Read More

Out with the new.

In with the old.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Looking for best in class recycled metals?

We’ve got you covered! Most qualities are always in stock ensuring you lightning fast delivery. If not, we’ll find it for you, almost as fast.

Supply to us

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” bottom_margin=”20px” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/steel-scrap/”][vc_column_text]

Steel Scrap

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We handle around 500.000 tonnes of ferrous scrap every year.
And we would love to handle yours

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/metals-alloys/”][vc_column_text]

Metals & Alloys

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We buy non-ferrous product, like aluminum grades, copper related products, lead and lead alloys, nickel and nickel alloys.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/demolition/”][vc_column_text]

Demolition

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We offer a wide range of comprehensive dismantling and recycling solutions according to international standards

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” bottom_margin=”0px” el_class=”mb-0″ width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/steel-products/”][vc_column_text]

Steel Products

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We accept all kinds of steel products – long or flat, new or used, prime or second choice. Nothing goes to waste.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]

Residues Recycling

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We focus on research and customized solutions for the detailed extraction of non-ferrous metals from “earths” coming from shredding residues.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/weee-recycling/”][vc_column_text]

WEEE Recycling

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We can safely remove specified substances from electrical equipment and recover more materials for recycling.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/data-destruction/”][vc_column_text]

Data Destruction

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

We offer data destruction solutions to destroy data on magnetic, solid state and optical media for small and large projects.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#ffffff” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#d2d1cf” background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” top_margin=”20px” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”https://rimeco.com/recycle-with-us/granulation/” offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

Granulation

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

There is no type of cable we cannot handle. We take pride in guaranteeing you an exceptional service and secure destruction at highly competitive rates.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

When it comes to ferrous metals, we are all about quality and delivering exactly what you need.

[/vc_column_text]

Metals & Alloys

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]Exemplary service and unrivalled logistics. Quality non-ferrous products delivered on time – every time – at market price.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#002134″ background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#365f77″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ font_color=”#ffffff” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”/products/steel-products/”][vc_column_text el_class=”white”]

Steel Products

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

Reusable products, reliable supply. We keep a ready supply of best-in-class reusable steel.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-2-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#002134″ background_color_opacity=”1″ background_color_hover=”#365f77″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ font_color=”#ffffff” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/4″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_link=”/products/granulate-products/”][vc_column_text el_class=”white”]

Granulation Products

[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

Purity guaranteed. Our cable granulation facility produces copper granules as pure as 99.9% copper.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” vertically_center_columns=”true” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” top_padding=”30″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” shape_type=””][vc_column centered_text=”true” column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”991″ enable_bg_scale=”true” font_color=”#ffffff” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” el_class=”rimeco-frontpage–video” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_video_lightbox link_style=”play_button” video_url=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKG8Hu_cJOM”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_position=”all” background_color=”#d2d1cf” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” el_class=”text-black” width=”1/2″ tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text el_class=”d-block” max_width=”436″]

In the recycling
business since 1888.

130 years, 5 generations.

It is safe to say that at RIMECO, experience, tradition and innovation go hand in hand. We have made a sport out of meeting and exceeding the ever more complex needs of our customers and the industry.[/vc_column_text]
